de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.session

Interface ImSessionManager<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the connection type (e.g. IMC or IMV connection)
    V - the session type (e.g. IMC or IMV session)
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultImSessionManager

    public interface ImSessionManager<K,V>
    Holds all sessions and manages them according to their state.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V getSession(K connection)
      Returns a session for the given connection.
      void initialize()
      Initializes the manager.
      V putSession(K connection, V session)
      Adds a session and it underlying connection to be managed by the manager.
      void terminate()
      Terminates the manager.

    • Method Detail

      • getSession

        Returns a session for the given connection.

        Returns:

           V session)
        Adds a session and it underlying connection to be managed by the manager.

        session - the session
        Returns:
        the session

        Initializes the manager.

      • terminate

        Terminates the manager.
